amendment.description: To clarify the treatment of Committee report guidance on certain projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4838 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4838 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8675) To clarify the treatment of Committee report guidance on certain projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4838 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4838 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
